p: In Figure 5b, the decline is calculated on day 10 and day 20 compared to the first day for the yoghurt sample from cow milk with the addition of volatile lavender oil encapsulated in sodium alginates. The decline on day 10 compared to the first day is smaller than the decline on day 20 compared to the first day. The results obtained on day 20 are lower compared to day 10. The decline from day 10 compared to the first day was between 97–99%. The decline from day 20 compared to the first day was between 89–91%.
